text: Takaharu Furukawa is an archer from Japan. He was born on 9 August 1984. Furukawa competed at the 2004 Summer Olympics, 2008 Summer Olympics, 2012 Summer Olympics, 2016 Summer Olympics, and 2020 Summer Olympics.Takaharu FurukawaTakaharu FURUKAWA == References == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese archers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Japan Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Japan Category:People from Aomori Prefecture
title: Takaharu Furukawa
